info.title: Crosswork Data Gateway High Availability APIs
info.description: This document contains details of the Crosswork Data Gateway Manager RESTful APIs that can be used for CRUD operations of Data Gateways and HA Pools

post.description: Get list of HA Pools.You can specify criteria for the pool e.g. select * from HAPool where HAStatus=HAPool_PROTECTED

delete.description: Delete HA pools with uuids specified in the payload

put.description:
Update HA pool with uuid specified in the payload
 1) you can update number of spares
 2) number of ips in pool
 3) number of assigned data gateways in pool
 Make sure you satisfy the criteria such that Number of IPs in pool <= Physical data gateway uuids <= (Number of IPs in pool  + Spares)

post.description:
Creates HA pool with the payload specified.
 Make sure you satisfy criteria such that Number of IPs in pool <= Physical data gateway uuids <= (Number of IPs in pool  + Spares)

200.description: Adding a description to this response

delete.description: Delete physical data gateways with uuids specified in payload

put.description: You can update fields such as admin state maintenance/up of data gaeways whose uuids are specified in the payload
put.summary: Update data gateway such as admin state to maintenance/up
